context.speaker: Bekzod
context.en_line: Hi Sara! Did you go to the museum yesterday?

context.speaker: Sara
context.en_line: No, I didn't go to the museum.

context.speaker: Bekzod
context.en_line: Why didn't you go?

context.speaker: Sara
context.en_line: I was tired. I stayed at home.

context.speaker: Bekzod
context.en_line: Did she play football with you?

context.speaker: Sara
context.en_line: No, she didn't play football yesterday.

context.speaker: Bekzod
context.en_line: I didn't visit the castle last week.

context.speaker: Bekzod
context.en_line: I was busy. I worked all day.

context.speaker: Sara
context.en_line: We didn't go together. That's sad.

context.speaker: Manager
context.en_line: Did you work as a teacher before?

strings.value: Ha, ikki yil o'qituvchi bo'lib ishladim.

context.speaker: Ali
context.en_line: Yes, I worked as a teacher for two years.

strings.value: Yaxshi! Siz menejer ham bo'lib ishladingizmi?

context.speaker: Manager
context.en_line: That's good! Did you work as a manager too?

context.speaker: Ali
context.en_line: No, I didn't work as a manager.

context.speaker: Manager
context.en_line: Did you work as a cook?

strings.value: Yo'q, oshpaz bo'lib ishlamadim. Pishirishni yoqtirmayman.

context.speaker: Ali
context.en_line: No, I didn't work as a cook. I don't like cooking.

context.speaker: Manager
context.en_line: Why didn't you work as a cook?

strings.value: Men o'qitishni yaxshi ko'raman. Bu mening ishim.

context.speaker: Ali
context.en_line: I love teaching. That's my job.

context.speaker: Manager
context.en_line: Did your brother work as a nurse?

strings.value: Ha, u o'tgan yili hamshira bo'lib ishladi.

context.speaker: Ali
context.en_line: Yes, he worked as a nurse last year.

strings.value: Salom Nilufar! Kecha nega maktabga kelmadingiz?

context.speaker: Madina
context.en_line: Hi Nilufar! Why didn't you come to school yesterday?

context.speaker: Nilufar
context.en_line: I didn't come because I was sick.

context.speaker: Madina
context.en_line: That's sad! Are you fine now?

strings.value: Ha, endi yaxshiman. Kecha futbol o'ynadingizmi?

context.speaker: Nilufar
context.en_line: Yes, I'm fine now. Did you play football yesterday?

context.speaker: Madina
context.en_line: No, I didn't play because I was tired.

context.speaker: Nilufar
context.en_line: Did your sister come to school?

context.speaker: Madina
context.en_line: No, she didn't come. She was at home.

context.speaker: Nilufar
context.en_line: Why didn't she come?

context.speaker: Madina
context.en_line: She didn't come because she was busy.

strings.value: Kecha dars o'qimadim chunki kasal edim.

context.speaker: Nilufar
context.en_line: I didn't study yesterday because I was sick.

context.en_canonical: No, I didn't go to the museum.
No, I didn't go to the museum.
No, I didn't go to the museum.

strings.value: 'Didn't' o'zi o'tmishni ko'rsatadi. Shuning uchun ikkinchi fe'l BASE shaklda qoladi: didn't go, didn't play, didn't visit. XATO: didn't went, didn't played. Bu eng ko'p xato qilinadigan qoida!

context.en_canonical: Did you go to the museum yesterday?
Did you go to the museum yesterday?
Did you go to the museum yesterday?

strings.value: 'Did' o'zi o'tmishni ko'rsatadi. Shuning uchun fe'l BASE shaklda qoladi: Did you go? Did she play? Did they visit? XATO: Did you went? Did she played?
Nega 'Did you go' — 'Did you went' emas?
Siz sabab so'ramaganmisiz? Nega qilmaganini bilmoqchimisiz?

context.en_canonical: Why didn't you go?
Why didn't you go?
Why didn't you go?

strings.value: 'Why' + didn't + subject + BASE verb: Why didn't you go? Why didn't she play? XATO: 'Why you didn't go?' — tartib noto'g'ri! Ingliz tilida savol so'z tartibida auxiliary oldin keladi.
Biror kishi nimani qilmaganiga sabab so'rang.
Siz yolg'iz bordingizmi? Faqat o'zingiz bordingizmi?

context.en_canonical: No, we went together!

strings.value: Yo'q, men yolg'iz bormadim. Biz birga bordik!

context.en_canonical: No, we went together!
No, we went together!

strings.value: 'Together' odatda gap oxirida turadi: We went together. They studied together. 'Alone' = yolg'iz (qarama-qarshi). 'Together' = birga, birgalikda.
Men va singlim birga maktabga yurdik.

context.en_canonical: I didn't visit the castle last week.
I didn't visit the castle last week.
I didn't visit the castle last week.

strings.value: 'Castle' = /ˈkɑːsl/ — 't' talaffuz qilinmaydi! Bu jim harf (silent letter). Boshqa misol: 'listen' = /ˈlɪsn/ ('t' jim). Ingliz tilida ko'p jim harflar bor.

context.en_canonical: No, I was sad.

strings.value: Yo'q, men xursand emas edim. Men xafa edim.

context.en_canonical: No, I was sad.
No, I was sad.

strings.value: His-tuyg'u sifatlari juftlik qiladi: sad ↔ happy, tired ↔ energetic, nervous ↔ calm, excited ↔ bored. O'tmishda: 'I was sad' / 'She was happy'.
O'qituvchimiz kasal bo'lganda biz xafa edik.

context.en_canonical: No, I worked as a teacher.

strings.value: Yo'q, men talaba emas edim. Men o'qituvchi edim!

context.en_canonical: No, I worked as a teacher.

strings.value: Men ikki yil o'qituvchi bo'lib ishladim.

context.en_canonical: No, I worked as a teacher.

strings.value: 'Work as a' = kasb sifatida ishlash. 'As' = sifatida. 'A' = bitta. 'I worked as a teacher' = Men o'qituvchi sifatida ishladim. Barcha kasblar uchun: 'as a nurse', 'as a cook'.
Ha, ikki yil o'qituvchi bo'lib ishladim.
U o'tgan yili o'qituvchi bo'lib ishladi.
Mening onam o'qituvchi bo'lib ishladi chunki u bolalarni yaxshi ko'radi.

context.en_canonical: No, I didn't work as a manager.
No, I didn't work as a manager.
No, I didn't work as a manager.

strings.value: Fe'lga '-er' qo'shsak, odam ma'nosini beradi: teach → teacher, work → worker, manage → manager, play → player. Bu productiv suffiks.
U besh yil menejer bo'lib ishladi.
U menejer bo'lib ishladimi? — Ha, ishladi.

context.en_canonical: No, I didn't work as a cook.
No, I didn't work as a cook.

strings.value: Men oshpaz bo'lib ishlamadim. Pishirishni yoqtirmayman.

context.en_canonical: No, I didn't work as a cook.

strings.value: 'Cook' ism (oshpaz: He's a cook) VA fe'l (pishirmoq: I cook food). 'Cooking' = gerund (pishirish): 'I like cooking.' = Men pishirishni yoqtiraman. Farq: cook (kishi/harakat) vs cooking (jarayon).
Yo'q, oshpaz bo'lib ishlamadim. Pishirishni yoqtirmayman.
Mening otam oshpaz chunki u pishirishni yaxshi ko'radi.

context.en_canonical: He worked as a nurse last year.

strings.value: Yo'q, akam shifokor emas, hamshira bo'lib ishladi.

context.en_canonical: He worked as a nurse last year.

strings.value: U o'tgan yili hamshira bo'lib ishladi.

context.en_canonical: He worked as a nurse last year.

strings.value: 'Nurse' = hamshira (bemordarga g'amxo'rlik, dori berish). 'Doctor' = shifokor (kasal tashxis qo'yish, retsept yozish). Ikkalasi ham kasalxonada ishlaydi. 'Nurse' erkak ham bo'lishi mumkin!
Ha, u o'tgan yili hamshira bo'lib ishladi.
U o'n yil hamshira bo'lib ishladi.

context.en_canonical: Yes, I worked before.
Yes, I worked before.
Yes, I worked before.

strings.value: 'Before' = oldin, avval, ilgari. 'After' = keyin, so'ng. 'Before school' = maktabdan oldin. 'After school' = maktabdan keyin. Gap oxirida ham keladi: 'I worked there before.' = Men u yerda ilgari ishladim.
Bu sizning hobbingizmi? Faqat sevimli mashg'ulotingizmi?

context.en_canonical: No, that's my job!

strings.value: Yo'q, bu mening hobbim emas. Bu mening ishim!

context.en_canonical: No, that's my job!
No, that's my job!

strings.value: 'Job' = sanaladigan ish (a job, two jobs). 'Work' = sanalmaydigan ish (work, no 'a'). 'I have a job' but 'I have work to do'. 'Job' = aniq kasb; 'Work' = umuman ishlash.

context.en_canonical: I didn't come because I was sick.

strings.value: Ha, sabab bor. Men kelmadim chunki kasal edim.

context.en_canonical: I didn't come because I was sick.
I didn't come because I was sick.

strings.value: 'Because' + SUBJECT + VERB: 'because I was sick' (chunki men kasal edim). 'Because' dan keyin to'liq gap (subject + verb) kerak. XATO: 'because sick' (subject va verb yo'q!).
Ular muzeyga bormadi chunki band edilar.
Kecha nega nimadir qilmadingiz? Sabab ayting.

context.en_canonical: No, I was sick.

strings.value: Yo'q, men yaxshi emas edim. Men kasal edim.

context.en_canonical: No, I was sick.
No, I was sick.

strings.value: 'Sick' = kasal (eng ko'p ishlatiladi, ayniqsa AQShda). 'Ill' = kasal (rasmiyroq, Britaniyada). 'Unwell' = kasal (eng rasmiy). Barchasi bir xil ma'no. 'Sick' ↔ 'healthy/well' (qarama-qarshi).

context.en_canonical: I didn't come to school yesterday.
I didn't come to school yesterday.
I didn't come to school yesterday.

strings.value: 'Come' = kelmoq (gapiruvchi tomonga harakat). 'Go' = bormoq (gapiruvchidan uzoqqa). 'Come to school' = maktabga kel. 'Go to school' = maktabga bor. O'tmishi: came (irregular!), went.
Singliz bo'sh edimi kecha? Dam oldimi?

context.en_canonical: She was busy.

strings.value: Yo'q, u bo'sh emas edi. U band edi.

context.en_canonical: She was busy.
She was busy.

strings.value: 'Because' bilan SABAB aytamiz. Eng ko'p ishlatiladigan sabablar: 'because I was tired' (charchagan), 'because I was sick' (kasal), 'because I was busy' (band). Sabablar 'was/were' + sifat.
Men kecha band edim. Kun bo'yi ishladim.
O'tgan hafta band edingizmi? — Ha, juda band edim.
